about_the_game:
Welcome to the SCP Facility!

Step into a thrilling and immersive horror experience based on the SCP universe. Choose from multiple roles, including scientists, Class-D personnel, various SCPs, facility guards, MTF operatives, and Chaos Insurgency members!

In SCP: CB Multiplayer Reborn, a wide range of terrifying adventures awaits. Immerse yourself in a highly atmospheric, suspense-filled world where every corner holds new dangers, and every decision could mean life or death

Experience the Full Story in Single-Player or Multiplayer Co-op!

Welcome to Story Mode, a thrilling experience you can enjoy solo or with friends. As a Class-D test subject, escape the site during a facility-wide breach, encountering some of the SCP Foundation’s most dangerous entities and navigating endless corridors. With multiple possible endings, your choices shape your journey as you uncover secrets, evade threats, and strive for survival in the chaos. Can you emerge unscathed, or will the horrors lurking within get the better of you?

Fight for Survival or Control in PvP Breach Mode!

In PvP Breach Mode, take on various roles—whether as Class-D personnel, a scientist, a guard, an elite MTF unit, or even a member of the Chaos Insurgency. This mode features randomized map generation, making each playthrough a unique experience. Form alliances, cooperate, or betray others in a high-stakes setting where every interaction can lead to intense, dynamic scenarios. Can you survive or secure the facility against other players from around the world?

content_descriptors.notes: Includes gore, violence and drug use. Gore and violence usually occurs in tandem with the use of firearms and the likes.

detailed_description:
Welcome to the SCP Facility!

Step into a thrilling and immersive horror experience based on the SCP universe. Choose from multiple roles, including scientists, Class-D personnel, various SCPs, facility guards, MTF operatives, and Chaos Insurgency members!

In SCP: CB Multiplayer Reborn, a wide range of terrifying adventures awaits. Immerse yourself in a highly atmospheric, suspense-filled world where every corner holds new dangers, and every decision could mean life or death

Experience the Full Story in Single-Player or Multiplayer Co-op!

Welcome to Story Mode, a thrilling experience you can enjoy solo or with friends. As a Class-D test subject, escape the site during a facility-wide breach, encountering some of the SCP Foundation’s most dangerous entities and navigating endless corridors. With multiple possible endings, your choices shape your journey as you uncover secrets, evade threats, and strive for survival in the chaos. Can you emerge unscathed, or will the horrors lurking within get the better of you?

Fight for Survival or Control in PvP Breach Mode!

In PvP Breach Mode, take on various roles—whether as Class-D personnel, a scientist, a guard, an elite MTF unit, or even a member of the Chaos Insurgency. Form alliances, cooperate, or betray others in a high-stakes setting where every interaction can lead to intense, dynamic scenarios. legal_notice:
"SCP: CB Multiplayer Reborn" is an independent, fan-made project built on SCP: CB Ultimate Edition Reborn, developed by Ultimate Edition Team. It is based on SCP - Containment Breach, originally created by Undertow Games and Third Subdivision Studios. This game is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 License (CC BY-SA 3.0).

This project utilizes DirectX for graphics and FMOD as its sound engine. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by the SCP Foundation or any related entities. All SCP content is derived from the SCP Foundation Wiki under the terms of the CC BY-SA 3.0 license.
name: SCP: CB Multiplayer Reborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2160
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 9600 / AMD RADEON 6250HD
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3GHZ, 4 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Survive the chaos of SCP Foundation! Step into a thrilling SCP horror experience with story-driven co-op, intense PvP Breach mode, and randomized maps. Play as Class-D, scientist, SCPs, and more, each role bringing unique challenges in an unpredictable, immersive facility.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
